excerpt: "Despite the incredible benefits AI can offer to organizations, industry reports state that only 14.6% of firms have deployed AI capabilities in production. The DataRobot and Hexaware partnership enables institutions to break through this barrier with the powerful capabilities of the DataRobot AI Cloud that offers a unified platform for user personas,"
